SEARCH
Package task

Class Deadline

java.lang.Object
task.Task
task.Deadline
public class Deadline extends Task
Represents a task with a deadline. A Deadline task has a description and a specific date and time by which it needs to be completed.

    • Deadline

      public Deadline(String description, String by)
      Constructs a Deadline task with the specified description and a deadline time as a string.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the task.
      by - The deadline time in the format "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm".

    • Deadline

      public Deadline(String description, LocalDateTime by)
      Constructs a Deadline task with the specified description and a deadline time as a string.
      Parameters:
      description - The description of the task.
      by - The deadline time as a LocalDateTime object.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Deadline task. Includes the task type, completion status, description, and formatted deadline time.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Task
      Returns:
      A string representation of the task.

    • toSaveFormat

      public String toSaveFormat()
      Returns a formatted string suitable for saving the task to a file. Includes the task type, completion status, description, and formatted deadline time.
      Specified by:
      toSaveFormat in class Task
      Returns:
      A formatted string representation of the task for saving.
